1.31.name: wordpress/wp-nano-ad
1.31.description: WP Nano Ads is your complete image link management solution. You can use this plugin for adding tiny Sponsor link images, which we call 'Nano Ads'! You can set only home page linking option or all pages. This plugin will help you to notify the ad owner when his / her ad is expiring and incase if the owner does not renew the link, this plugin will delete that link automatically. You can set the email notification, ad Link adding and delete date, notification date etc.
